    U[Admin] -->|Teacher/School Data| S(System)
    U -->|View/Export Plans| S
    U -->|Manual Adjustments| S
    S -->|Exported Reports/Plans| U
    S -->|Excel Exports| U
    S -->|Notifications/Warnings| U

        S[Teacher Allocation System]

    E[Excel Files] -- Import/Export --> S
    M[Ministry/Internship Office] -- Budget, Quotas --> S
